title.narrative: Second Phase Community Based Rural Development Project,

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to support the Recipient's rural communes in planning and implementing local development activities in a participatory and sustainable manner. The Project contributes to the second phase of the National Program for Decentralized Rural Development.

condition.narrative: Each year commencing the second year after the Effective Date, carry out an independent procurement audit of selectedBeneficiaries; and (iii) furnish to the Association the audit report
No later than November 30 of each calendar year, the Recipient shall have prepared an Annual Work Program for the forthcomingyear,in form and substance
No later than ninety days after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall establish in each region a Project Regional CoordinationUnit, with terms of reference satisfactory to the Association
No later than sixty days after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall have prepared the first Annual Work Program for the runningcalendar year, in form and substance acceptable to the Association.
No later than thirty (30) months after the Effective date, the Recipient and the Association shall carry out a mid term review
the Recipient shall carry out an independent performance evaluation of the key staff

title.narrative: % of Rural Municipal Councils with (at least) a satisfactory rating during the annual performance review.
% of Rural Municipal Councils organize quarterly public meetings during which they report on their activities.
% of financial and procurement audits are unqualified.
% of Municipal Councils in which planning functions are carried out satisfactorily.
% of households in supported villages using basic services (primary schools, health center, water source)

comment.narrative: Data provided by a study done by University of Ouagadougou ( March - June 2011) on " Conditions et niveau de vie des ménagesrurauxau Burkina Faso ''.

title.narrative: % of expenses planned in PAI executed annually.

comment.narrative: Payment process to services providers is long; so, expenses rate is always low and the physical implementation high.

title.narrative: % of CVD organize annually public meetings during which they report on their activities (Assemblee generale bilan).
% of investment maintained in a satisfactory way.
% of physical investments financed by the project of good technical quality.

comment.narrative: no change before end of their FY on december 2009

title.narrative: % of Rural Municipal Councils submits quarterly M&E reports on time.
Number of people in rural areas provided with access to Improved Water Sources under the project

comment.narrative: Cumulative progress as of June 2011. No change at the current SPN date.
